title: ‘We Still Kick’: Old Dog Roglič Reaffirms Who’s ‘OG’ of the Big 4 with Catalunya Raid
content:
Red Bull captain claims status of Giro d'Italia favorite after schooling Ayuso with brutal coup on Catalunya, but can he keep a leash on Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel at the Tour?

Read the full article at ‘We Still Kick’: Old Dog Roglič Reaffirms Who’s ‘OG’ of the Big 4 with Catalunya Raid on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
